text: "Harder" is a song by English DJ Jax Jones and American singer-songwriter Bebe Rexha, released on 12 July 2019. It is the ninth single from Jones's debut EP Snacks (2018), and was also included on his debut studio album, Snacks (Supersize) (2019). The music video for the song was released on 31 July 2019. The song was released to top 40 radio on 13 August 2019. ==Critical reception== Jason Lipshutz of Billboard called the song a "dance-pop opus" and a "quick ray of sun" with "whirring beats" that "continues Rexha down a promising path". ==Promotion== Jones shared a snippet of the song on 9 July, asking fans who they thought was singing on it. He revealed the collaboration in another post on 10 July. ==Music video== The music video for the song was released on 31 July. The video features Bebe Rexha on the day of her wedding and her fighting with her husband-to be and glancing at the wedding singer (Jax Jones) ==Track listing== ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2019) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- |- |- ! scope="row"| China Airplay/FL (Billboard) | 15 |- ! scope="row"| Croatia (HRT) | 16 |- |- ! scope="row"| Iceland (Tonlist) | 39 |- |- ! scope="row"| Lithuania (AGATA) | 65 |- ! scope="row"| New Zealand Hot Singles (RMNZ) | 31 |- |- |- |- ! scope="row"| Slovenia (SloTop50) | 43 |- ! scope="row"| Sweden (Sverigetopplistan) | 64 |- |- |} ===Year-end charts=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2019) ! scope="col"| Position |- ! scope="row"| Poland (ZPAV) | 25 |- ! scope="row"| US Hot Dance/Electronic Songs (Billboard) | 83 |} ==Certifications== ==Release history== {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- ! scope="col"| Country ! scope="col"| Date ! scope="col"| Format ! scope="col"| Version ! scope="col"| Label ! scope="col"| |- ! scope="row" rowspan="2"| Various | 12 July 2019 | rowspan="2"| | Original | rowspan="2"| Polydor | align="center"| |- | 31 July 2019 | KC Lights Remix EP | align="center"| |- ! scope="row"| United States | 13 August 2019 | Top 40 radio | Original | Interscope | align="center"| |} ==References== ==External links== * * * * Category:2019 singles Category:2019 songs Category:Bebe Rexha songs Category:Jax Jones songs Category:Songs written by Jax Jones Category:Songs written by Camille Purcell Category:Songs written by Steve Mac Category:Songs written by Bebe Rexha Category:Song recordings produced by Steve Mac
